data.title: Whitworth University Financial Aid Office â€“ Annual Full
data.text:
Welcome to the Whitworth Annual Cost and Payment Calculator for 2024-25. We provide this tool to help full-time, day, undergraduate students and their parents ESTIMATE how much will be owed to Whitworth after applying resources from financial aid. (International students please be sure to include your required health insurance costs when doing your calculations.) Actual costs per semester may vary depending on outside scholarships being applied to only one or both semesters. Also, there may be additional fees not reflected in this estimator. Prior to each semester, students will be able to electroncially review their specific fall and spring billing information.

To review a list of all costs (billable and non-billable) related to attending Whitworth, visit https://www.whitworth.edu/cms/administration/financial-aid/cost-and-payment-information/.
